metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14048 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue has been found in libpng 1.6.34. It is a SEGV in the function png_free_data in png.c, related to the recommended error handling for png_read_image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpng12-0 - 1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
libpng3 - 1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libpng16-16 - 1.6.20-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
libpng16-tools - 1.6.20-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpng package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1').
libpng1.6 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.20-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
